lines.gurmukhi: jYsy biRQwvMq jMq AauKd ihqwie irdY biRQw blu ibmuK hoie shij invws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Bridaavant Jant Aoukhad Hitaai Ridai , Bridaa Balu Bimoukh Hoi Sahaji Nivaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a medicine suits a person, he-gets cured and becomes peaceful and comfortable.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Awn Dwq mY qnk hI klMk fwry Ank brn myit knik pRgws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Aan Dhaat Mai Tanak Hee Kalank Daaray , Anak Baran Mayti Kanaki Pragaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as adding some chemicals in the metals give them a shinning lustre and their original colour vanishes.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy koit Bwir kr kwsit iekqRqw mY rMck hI AwNc dyq Bsm audws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Koti Bhaari Kar Kaasati Ikatrataa Mai , Ranchak Hee Aanch Dayt Bhasam Udaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a small amount of fire can reduce millions of heaps of woods into ashes and destroy it.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur aupdys aur AMqr p√çys Bey jnm mrn duK doKn ibnws hY ]364]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gur Oupadays Ur Antar Pravays Bhaay , Janam Maran Doukh Dokhan Binaas Hai ?364?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, when the teachings of the True Guru resides in the mind of a seeker, his cycle of birth and death and all his sins are destroyed. (364)
